channel.title: Obituaries on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Obituaries on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hulk Hogan, Pro Wrestler Who Became a Household Name, Dies at 71
item.description: Fueled by Hulkamania, he played good guys and bad in the ring, starred in movies and had his own reality show and Saturday morning cartoon.

item.title: Hulk Hogan, Pro Wrestler Who Became a Household Name, Dies at 71
item.description: Fueled by Hulkamania, he played good guys and bad in the ring, starred in movies and had his own reality show and Saturday morning cartoon.

item.title: Michael Ochs, Pop Culture’s Preeminent Photo Archivist, Dies at 82
item.description: The self-described “music junkie” collected millions of images of singers, actors and celebrities for an archive that fed CD reissues, books, news sites and documentaries.

item.title: Michael Ochs, Pop Culture’s Preeminent Photo Archivist, Dies at 82
item.description: The self-described “music junkie” collected millions of images of singers, actors and celebrities for an archive that fed CD reissues, books, news sites and documentaries.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne, Black Sabbath Frontman and Heavy Metal Legend, Dies at 76
item.description: Ozzy Osbourne, a founding father of British heavy metal, a latter-day solo star and a new-millennium reality TV luminary, died Tuesday after a yearslong struggle with Parkinson’s disease. He was

item.title: Jimmy Hunt, Young Star of ‘Invaders From Mars,’ Dies at 85
item.description: From 1945-53, he appeared in 35 films, and his onscreen parents included Dick Powell, Teresa Wright, Ronald Reagan, Patricia Neal, Leif Erickson and Claudette Colbert.

item.title: Jimmy Hunt, Young Star of ‘Invaders From Mars,’ Dies at 85
item.description: From 1945-53, he appeared in 35 films, and his onscreen parents included Dick Powell, Teresa Wright, Ronald Reagan, Patricia Neal, Leif Erickson and Claudette Colbert.

item.title: ‘The Cosby Show’ Star Malcolm-Jamal Warner Dies From Accidental Drowning at 54 (Reports)
item.description: The Emmy-nominated actor and director played Theo Huxtable on the long-running Bill Cosby comedy.

item.title: ‘The Cosby Show’ Star Malcolm-Jamal Warner Dies From Accidental Drowning at 54 (Reports)
item.description: The Emmy-nominated actor and director played Theo Huxtable on the long-running Bill Cosby comedy.

item.title: Gary Smith, Eight-Time Emmy-Winning Producer, Dies at 90
item.description: His credits included ‘The Judy Garland Show,’ ‘Hullabaloo,’ Tony and Emmy telecasts and specials featuring Elvis Presley, Barbra Streisand and Burt Bacharach.

item.title: Gary Smith, Eight-Time Emmy-Winning Producer, Dies at 90
item.description: His credits included ‘The Judy Garland Show,’ ‘Hullabaloo,’ Tony and Emmy telecasts and specials featuring Elvis Presley, Barbra Streisand and Burt Bacharach.

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, ‘Cosby Show’ Star, Dies at 54
item.description: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, who played Theodore Huxtable across all eight seasons of “The Cosby Show,” has died in an accidental drowning, People reports. He was 54. According to the magazine, W

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, ‘Cosby Show’ Star, Dies at 54
item.description: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, who played Theodore Huxtable across all eight seasons of “The Cosby Show,” has died in an accidental drowning, People reports. He was 54. According to the magazine, W

item.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter’s Stepson Shoots and Kills His 13-Year-Old Son in “Incomprehensible Tragic Accident”
item.description: Duane “Dog” Chapman’s stepson Gregory Zecca, who is the son of Chapman’s wife, Francie, reportedly shot his son Anthony on Saturday in Florida.

item.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter’s Stepson Shoots and Kills His 13-Year-Old Son in “Incomprehensible Tragic Accident”
item.description: Duane “Dog” Chapman’s stepson Gregory Zecca, who is the son of Chapman’s wife, Francie, reportedly shot his son Anthony on Saturday in Florida.

item.title: Tom Troupe, Stage and Screen Actor Who Appeared in ‘Star Trek’ and ‘Cagney & Lacey,’ Dies at 97
item.description: Troupe was married to the late actress Carole Cook.

item.title: Tom Troupe, Stage and Screen Actor Who Appeared in ‘Star Trek’ and ‘Cagney & Lacey,’ Dies at 97
item.description: Troupe was married to the late actress Carole Cook.

item.title: Eileen Fulton, Longtime ‘Bad Girl’ Lisa on ‘As the World Turns,’ Dies at 91
item.description: Fulton’s family announced that she died on July 14 after a period of declining health.

item.title: Eileen Fulton, Longtime ‘Bad Girl’ Lisa on ‘As the World Turns,’ Dies at 91
item.description: Fulton’s family announced that she died on July 14 after a period of declining health.

item.title: Alan Bergman, Oscar-Winning Lyricist, Dies at 99
item.description: He wrote songs with his late wife, Marilyn Bergman, for more than 50 years, collaborating with the likes of Astaire, Sinatra, Streisand, Hamlisch and Legrand.

item.title: Alan Bergman, Oscar-Winning Lyricist, Dies at 99
item.description: He wrote songs with his late wife, Marilyn Bergman, for more than 50 years, collaborating with the likes of Astaire, Sinatra, Streisand, Hamlisch and Legrand.

item.title: Kate Beckinsale Announces Death of Her Mother, British Actress Judy Loe, at 78: “I Am Paralyzed”
item.description: Loe, best known for her TV work on shows like ‘General Hospital,’ ‘Inspector Morse,’ ‘Casualty’ and ‘Holby City,’ died on July 15 following a stage four cancer diagnosis.

item.title: Kate Beckinsale Announces Death of Her Mother, British Actress Judy Loe, at 78: “I Am Paralyzed”
item.description: Loe, best known for her TV work on shows like ‘General Hospital,’ ‘Inspector Morse,’ ‘Casualty’ and ‘Holby City,’ died on July 15 following a stage four cancer diagnosis.

item.title: Joanna Bacon, British Actress Known for ‘Love Actually’ and ‘Breeders,’ Dies at 72
item.description: Bacon’s death was confirmed by the Harlow Theatre Company this week, who said she passed away on June 14 following a battle with cancer.

item.title: Joanna Bacon, British Actress Known for ‘Love Actually’ and ‘Breeders,’ Dies at 72
item.description: Bacon’s death was confirmed by the Harlow Theatre Company this week, who said she passed away on June 14 following a battle with cancer.

item.title: Debbie Nightingale, Hot Docs Festival Co-Founder, Dies at 71
item.description: The veteran indie producer and Paul Jay launched a film showcase in 1993 that eventually became North America’s largest documentary festival.

item.title: Debbie Nightingale, Hot Docs Festival Co-Founder, Dies at 71
item.description: The veteran indie producer and Paul Jay launched a film showcase in 1993 that eventually became North America’s largest documentary festival.

item.title: Connie Francis, ‘Where the Boys Are’ Singer and Actress, Dies at 87
item.description: One of the most commercially successful female singers in history, she also had hits with “Who’s Sorry Now?,” “Mama,” “Everybody’s Somebody’s Fool” and “Stupid Cupid.”

item.title: Connie Francis, ‘Where the Boys Are’ Singer and Actress, Dies at 87
item.description: One of the most commercially successful female singers in history, she also had hits with “Who’s Sorry Now?,” “Mama,” “Everybody’s Somebody’s Fool” and “Stupid Cupid.”

item.title: Andrea Gibson, Poet and Subject of Doc ‘Come See Me in the Good Light,’ Dies at 49
item.description: Gibson’s books included ‘You Better Be Lightning,’ ‘Take Me With You’ and ‘Lord of the Butterflies.’

item.title: Andrea Gibson, Poet and Subject of Doc ‘Come See Me in the Good Light,’ Dies at 49
item.description: Gibson’s books included ‘You Better Be Lightning,’ ‘Take Me With You’ and ‘Lord of the Butterflies.’

item.title: B. Saroja Devi, Icon of South Indian Cinema, Dies at 87
item.description: B. Saroja Devi, one of the most celebrated leading ladies of South Indian cinema whose cross-industry stardom spanned Kannada, Tamil, Telugu and Hindi-language films, died on Monday at her residence i

item.title: David Gergen, Political Commentator and Advisor to Four U.S. Presidents, Dies at 83
item.description: David Gergen, a former political analyst and consultant to four American presidents, has died. He was 83. His son, Christopher, confirmed to the New York Times that Gergen died of Lewy body dementia i

item.title: David Gergen, Political Commentator and Advisor to Four U.S. Presidents, Dies at 83
item.description: David Gergen, a former political analyst and consultant to four American presidents, has died. He was 83. His son, Christopher, confirmed to the New York Times that Gergen died of Lewy body dementia i
